entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 12:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 8.5°C
Wind: SSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of freezing drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High plus 2.
